trans-unit.source: Defines a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler"></xref> that processes Windows Username tokens.
trans-unit.target: Define uma <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler"> </xref> que processa tokens de nome de usuário do Windows.

trans-unit.source: The WindowsUserNameSecurityTokenHandler class extends the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityTokenHandler> class to add validation of tokens.
trans-unit.target: A classe WindowsUserNameSecurityTokenHandler estende o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityTokenHandler>classe adicionar validação de tokens.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityTokenHandler>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.WindowsUserNameSecurityTokenHandler"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.WindowsUserNameSecurityTokenHandler"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this handler supports validation of tokens of type <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityToken"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se este manipulador oferece suporte à validação dos tokens do tipo <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityToken"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the handler supports validation of tokens of type <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityToken"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o manipulador oferece suporte à validação dos tokens do tipo <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityToken"> </xref>; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Validates the specified token and returns its claims.
trans-unit.target: Valida o token especificado e retorna suas declarações.

trans-unit.source: The identities that are contained in the token.
The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.Configuration*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.Configuration*>é de propriedade <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.Configuration*>

trans-unit.source: LogonUser using the specified token failed.
trans-unit.target: Falha de LogonUser usando o token especificado.
